title: Cook
description:
A person responsible for food preparation wearing a white buttoned chef jacket and toque hat.

Usually shown with either a wooden spoon or a skillet frying an egg, though WhatsApp's design is holding a spatula.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the cook emoji stands with a confident posture, wearing a crisp white chef's hat and apron.  The rendering features Apple's characteristic smooth gradients and realistic lighting, giving the character a friendly and approachable appearance.  This cheerful cook, often depicted with a slight smile, symbolizes culinary expertise, delicious food, and the joy of preparing a meal.
